text: Manuel Locatelli (born 8 January 1998) is an Italian professional footballer who plays as a defensive midfielder for Juventus F.C. and the Italy national team. == References == == Other websites == * Category:1998 births Category:Association football midfielders Category:A.C. Milan players Category:Footballers from Lombardy Category:Living people Category:21st- century Italian people Category:UEFA European Championship-winning players
title: Manuel Locatelli
